alert.note: Alert for Banner; Cheyenne; Kimball (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 01 at 3:37AM CST until February 03 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 2 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Light to moderate snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches possible. * WHERE...Platte, Goshen, and eastern Laramie counties in southeast Wyoming including Wheatland, Torrington, and Pine Bluffs. Banner, Kimball, Cheyenne, Scotts Bluff, and southern Sioux counties in the Nebraska Panhandle including Kimball, Sidney, Harrisburg, and Scottsbluff. * WHEN...5 PM MST today until 2 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions possible due to slick, snow covered roads and reduced visibilities.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
